page.title: 07TOURISM
page.content: TOURISM IS ONE OF SHETLAND'S GROWING INDUSTRIES.MANY LINERS LIKE THE{ROYAL {VIKING SKY} AND THE{NORRONA}WITH PASSENGERS FROM FOREIGN COUNTRIES VISIT IN THE SUMMER MONTHS AND SEE FAMOUS PLACES IN SHETLAND LIKE{ {CLICKIMIN BROCH,JARLSHOF,MOUSA {BROCH,SCALLOWAY CASTLE}AND THE CROFTS IN THE COUNTRYSIDE.A LOT OF BIRDWATCHERS COME TO SHETLAND BECAUSE OF THE GREAT NUMBER OF SEABIRDS.{NOSS} AND{HERMANESS}IN{UNST}ARE FAVOURITE PLACES FOR BIRDWATCHERS.SOME PEOPLE COME FOR THE QUIET AND PEACEFULNESS OF THE COUNTRYSIDE.SOME COME TO SEE THE LOCAL CROFTERS AND THEIR WAY OF LIFE. THE SCENERY IS RUGGED BUT THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF GOOD BEACHES FOR PICNICS.FAVOURITE SPOTS INCLUDE{ST {NINIAN'S ISLE,SPIGGIE BEACH,BURRA {ISLE,LEVENWICK BEACH}AND{SUMBURGH {BEACH. }
